Package image.controller

Interface Features

All Known Implementing Classes:
BatchControllerImpl, ControllerImpl
public interface Features
Represents this Image Generator's features.
Version:
09/2020
Author:
Peter Laudat

    • load

      void load​(String imageInfile) throws IOException
      Loads this model from a file.
      Parameters:
      imageInfile - image input file
      Throws:
      IOException - if errors encountered while reading image input file

      Parameters:
      imageOutfile - image output file
      Throws:
      IOException - if errors encountered while writing image output file
